instructions: In a large pot over medium high heat, saut E the ground beef.
Add the taco seasoning, soup, water, onions, carrots, potatoes, celery and beans.
Cover and simmer about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
title: Hamburger Stew
steps: In a large pot over medium high heat, saut E the ground beef. Add the taco seasoning, soup, water, onions, carrots, potatoes, celery and beans. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer about 30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
